Text: I get it NEW 52, but really!? EVERY ONE LOVES this show and the comic is great, but no, who cares about fans, its all about office politics and who has the rights and our company vision .... >:(

Thanks for all the great stuff, MrDowntown.  Here's a short list of recent Dynamite requests:

Bionic Man 16
Bionic Man Vs. Bionic Woman 2
Bionic Woman 8
Lone Ranger v2 12
Lone Ranger: Snake of Iron 4
Lord of the Jungle 11-12
The Shadow 9

@MrDowntown
Also, how editors feel about the characters and what they WANT do happen.
Case and point: Barbara Gordon was a badass cripple who became much more interesting as Oracle? Fuck that, she HAS to be Batgirl, because WE grew up with her! What, Cassandra Cain and Stephanie Brown? THERE'S ONLY ONE BATGIRL!11!!1!!1! Writers want to use those characters? Fuck that. Readers want to SEE those characters? If only to know if they still exist? I know! let's string them along and not give a clear answer for over a year! Damn we're good at out jobs!
Okay., rant over. Thanks for the upload :)
True, And Dick Grayson evolving from robin to nightwing to batman. i was so sick of Bruce Wayne spinning his wheels and Dick and Damien were so interesting, then they just reset them ... the end.
I've been looking for the zero issue of this series. If possible, can you upload it? I can't find it anywhere.
